byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The combination of Grupo FerroAtlántica of Spain and Globe Specialty Metals of Florida will create a big international producer valued at about $3.1 billion.
snippet: The combination of Grupo FerroAtlántica of Spain and Globe Specialty Metals of Florida will create a big international producer valued at about $3.1 billion.
